participant_1.name: Aarav
participant_1.personality: Creative and independent, Aarav enjoys exploring unconventional ideas and expressing himself through music.
participant_1.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Saanvi
participant_2.personality: Determined and fashion-savvy, Saanvi has a keen eye for style and enjoys finding unique items to express her individuality.
participant_2.background: my family does not support my career choices. i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches.
